Description: Hope you are doing well. I am hiring an Oracle Fusion Finance Functional Consultant(Remote) for a Client of mine in Saudi Arabia. If interested, please share your cv with me and we can have a call to discuss furtherResponsibilities:1.      Client Engagement: Engage with clients to understand their finance-related business requirements, objectives, and challenges.
